title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.313 - Standard unit of measure
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.313 - Standard unit of measure

State Regulations

The standard unit of measure is used to provide a uniform
statistic for measuring and comparing hospital costs and productivity output, not activity. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.313

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
